sources.title: The Ring (1952) RITA MORENO
sources.description:
It’s FRIDAY@PizzaFLIX / New High-Definition Transfer!
Stars: Lalo Rios, Rita Moreno, and Jack Elam
Director: Kurt Neumann
Writer: Irving Shulman

When a young Mexican-American in East Los Angeles uses the boxing ring to make a better life for himself and his family, he learns as much about being a Latino in white society as he does about boxing. Based on the novel by Irving Shulman, who also wrote the original treatment for Rebel Without a Cause.

Trivia: Features “The Golden Boy,”  California boxing legend Art Aragon playing himself in his big screen debut.

sources.title: The Ring (1952) Lalo Ríos, Rita Moreno, Gerald Mohr
sources.description: The Ring is a 1952 American film noir drama sport film directed by Kurt Neumann and based on an Irving Shulman´s novel.The film was shot in various locations in Los Angeles. The cast includes Lalo Ríos, Rita Moreno and Gerald Mohr.
